liquibase.change.RenameTableChange

liquibase.change.RenameTableChange Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Renames an existing table.

SqlStatement [] liquibase.change.RenameTableChange.generateStatements ( Database  database  )  throws UnsupportedChangeException

Generates the SQL statements required to run the change.

Parameters:
database databasethe target Database associated to this change's statements
Returns:
an array of Strings with the statements
Exceptions:
UnsupportedChangeException if this change is not supported by the Database passed as argument

Implements liquibase.change.Change.

00065                                                                                                   {
00066         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00067         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00068         statements.add(new RenameTableStatement(schemaName, getOldTableName(), getNewTableName()));
00069         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00070             statements.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(schemaName, getNewTableName()));
00071         }
00072 
00073         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00074     }
